amendment.description: To illustrate the extreme degree of religious intolerance demonstrated by Boko Haram.

vote.text: Amendment SA 254 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 254 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Rubio to Amendment SA 253. (consideration: CR S1082; text: CR S1082) To illustrate the extreme degree of religious intolerance demonstrated by Boko Haram.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 254 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 254 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Rubio to Amendment SA 253.
